profile:
HomeWise Plumbing & Drainage is a family-owned and operated business started by David Topelko, who's been serving the commercial and residential plumbing needs of the Sooke and Greater Victoria areas for several decades.



We have an award winning, professional, experienced and expert staff. In fact, our apprentices have received the top marks at Camosun during their trades training to become journeyman red-seal plumbers - a recognized standard of excellence across Canada for trades training.  Our mission is to make sure our customers are completely satisfied. We use the highest quality products available and make sure our customers understand what theyâ€™re receiving for their money.
Plumbing Services, Drainage Services, Gas Fitting Services, Backflow Prevention
